events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving their vehicle and another driver at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorised as an Auto Accident case based on the nature of the incident described.
An agent has been assigned to the claim to assist the customer with the processing of the accident claim efficiently.
We sent an acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of their claim regarding the auto accident.
We requested the customer to submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and medical bills if applicable.
Customer submitted the requested documents, including photos from the collision and the official police accident report.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and liaising with the involved parties for further details.
Investigation concluded confirming liability and extent of damages consistent with the customer’s report.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on assessed damages and submitted to the customer for review.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the communication throughout the process.
The claim has been approved for payment following the customer’s acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Insurance payment was issued to the customer’s bank account covering the repair costs for their damaged vehicle.
The claim case has been officially closed after successful payment and positive customer confirmation.
All documentation and records related to this auto accident claim have been archived according to company retention policies.
